title: Upcoming Workshops and Events | Counseling Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Counseling Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Counseling Center      Counseling Center   Main Menu    About Us           Mission and Values    Scope of Practice    Meet Our Staff    Hours & Location         Services           What to Expect    Individual Counseling    Group Therapy    Couples Counseling    Mind Body Services    Psychiatry and Integrative Medicine    Outreach Services and Programs    Peer Support Network         Crisis           Crisis Services    Suicide Prevention and Education at UIC         Online Resources           COVID-19 Newsletters    Mental Health Resources    Coping with Recent Events    Campus Resources    Suicide Prevention and Education at UIC         Concerned Others           For Parents, Faculty, Staff, and Concerned Others    How to Help Someone in Distress         Training           APA Accredited Doctoral Internship Program in Health Service Psychology    Advanced Psychotherapy Externship    Post-Doctoral Fellowship    United Support Network Paraprofessional Program          Eyebrow menu    U&I Care    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Upcoming Workshops and Events  The UIC Counseling Center offers several workshops throughout the year. Below are one-time events, and you can also see our Mind Body Program page for information about regularly scheduled Koru Mindfulness and Self-Compassion programming. Check back often to learn about new offerings!       Upcoming Workshops       May  5  2020           Managing Your Mood During a Pandemic     Tuesday 5th, 4:30 pm–Tuesday 26th, 6:00 pm   Remote format to be disclosed at time of registration        May  7  2020           COVID-19 and the African American Student Experience     Thursday, 12:00 pm–1:00 pm         May  8  2020           Midday Movement & Meditation Workshop     Friday, 12:00 pm–1:00 pm   Online platform to be disclosed at time of registration
